pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
ARWYND FARMS
125'-4" X 291'-8" DAIRY BARN
5479 PERTH LINE 72
ATWOOD, ON
COVER PAGE
ALL ELEVATIONS
S1
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides the elevation views for the dairy barn project at Arwynd Farms. It includes the east, west, north, and south elevations, showing the overall dimensions and layout of the building. The sheet serves as a visual reference for the exterior appearance and architectural features of the barn.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block:

5479 PERTH LINE 72

FOUNDATION PLAN
S2
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet details the foundation plan for the dairy barn, indicating the layout of concrete floors, foundation walls, and footings. It provides essential information for constructing the base of the barn, ensuring stability and support for the structure above.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block:

ROOF PLAN
S4
pages.page_overview_summary: The roof plan sheet outlines the layout and design of the roof structure, including trusses, lateral bracing, and purlins. It provides guidance for the installation of the roof system, ensuring proper load distribution and structural integrity.

BUILDING SECTIONS
S5
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet provides detailed building sections, illustrating the vertical relationships and construction details of the barn. It includes information on steel beams, columns, and footings, offering a comprehensive view of the structural framework.

MAIN FLOOR PLAN
S3
pages.page_overview_summary: The main floor plan sheet outlines the layout of the ground floor, including stalls, utility rooms, and calf pens. It provides a detailed arrangement of spaces and functional areas, facilitating efficient use of the barn's interior.
